function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion through handling of ingredients and cooking equipment in multiple households.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases and potential outbreaks in the community.","Mitigation":"Strict sanitation protocols for ingredients, packaging, and cooking equipment. Education on proper hand hygiene and respiratory etiquette.","Technologies":"Contactless delivery and payment systems, UV sterilization for cooking equipment, IoT-enabled monitoring for sanitation compliance.","People":"Home chefs, Blue Apron customers, restaurant staff, delivery personnel.","Owner":"Blue Apron, local restaurants, delivery services."}]}
